synopsis.text: When Sora wakes up on a mysterious island, she finds that the Pretty Cures have been mysteriously separated from their usual teammates. Sora meets Yui, Manatsu, and Prim, with Prim able to transform into Cure Supreme. Meanwhile, Mashiro rescues Puka from a monster attack with the help of Laura, Amane, and Nodoka on another island. Tsubasa takes a walk through a hanging garden with Saaya, Ha-chan, and Haruka. Ageha meets up with Asumi, Lala, and Yukari, although Lala and Yukari struggle to get along at first. Despite meeting many new friends, the Cures realize their memories are hazy. It seems they are the only people stranded on these islands. Wanting to return home, they spot a distant castle and decide to journey towards it, hoping to find answers there. With 77 Pretty Cures brought together, new friendships and adventures await them on their quest.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
